RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the department: United States Department of Homeland Security

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: Conducts roving stops and may temporarily detain vehicles for investigation, governed by the standard articulated in relevant case law. Involved in the stop of the black Dodge pickup truck and white Malibu sedan.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Department of Homeland Sec: Received a phone call regarding an attempted alien smuggling event and conducted interviews at the Freer immigration checkpoint
